reviewText: Interesting footage from behind the scenes.
Great DVD for any Green Day fan
Bought this as a gift for my husband and he loved it. Said the first disc was all interviews with the band, all of which he had never seen before. He hasn't watched he second disc yet.
This is a very decent double DVD set on the rise and rise of Green Day. Lots of good footage and nice interviews throughout

though have not yet watched it as I was waiting for BROADWAY IDIOT so I could spend an afternoon relaxing with the Greenies and watching DVDs. The stars are for the anticipatory rating I am sure it will get.
Doing some early christmas shopping and I am sure my son will love this. He is a huge Green Day Fan.
